title: Stack Size Controller
description: Allows setting the max stack size of every item

title: Gather Manager
description: Increases the amount of items gained from gathering resources

title: Vanish
description: Allows players with permission to become truly invisible

title: NTeleportation
description: Multiple teleportation systems for admin and players

title: Rust Kits
description: Item kits, autokits, kit cooldowns, and more

title: Admin Radar
description: Item kits, autokits, kit cooldowns, and more

title: Remover Tool
description: Building and entity removal tool

title: Image Library
description: Plugin API for managing images

title: Backpacks
description: Allows players to have backpacks that provide them with extra inventory space

title: No Give Notices
description: Prevents F1 item giving notices from showing in the chat

title: Quick Smelt
description: Prevents F1 item giving notices from showing in the chat

title: Furnace Splitter
description: Splits up ores into equal stacks when you put them into furnaces

title: Better Loot
description: A complete re-implementation of the drop system

title: Copy Paste
description: Copy and paste your buildings to save them or move them

title: Death Notes
description: Broadcasts deaths to chat along with detailed information.

title: Info Panel
description: GUI panel with in-game clock, online players, sleepers and custom messages, etc.

title: Admin Panel
description: A small GUI panel of clickable commands for admins

title: Instant Craft
description: Allows players to instantly craft items with features

title: Time Of Day
description: Alters the day and night duration

title: ZLevels Remastered
description: Alters the day and night duration

title: Skins
description: Change workshop skins of items easily

title: Crafting Controller
description: Allows you to modify the time spend crafting and which items can be crafted

title: Zone Manager
description: Advanced zone manager for creating in-game zones

title: Magic Loot
description: Simple components multiplier and loot system

title: Player Administration
description: Player Administration provides a simple-to-use GUI that helps admins moderate users.

title: Auto Doors
description: Automatically closes doors behind players after the default amount of seconds or as set by them.

title: True PVE
description: True PVE is a damage control plugin originally intended to improve the default server PVE mode (server.pve = true) for servers who wish to truly be PVE. This plugin can be used to fine-tune PVP behavior as well, enabling a range of damage control configurations to be implemented to customize PVP, PVE, and anything in between.

title: BGrade
description: This plugin can automatically upgrade building blocks upon placement. Allowing players to upgrade their building blocks with ease, preventing the needed use of the Hammer.

title: Raidable Bases
description: Create fully automated raidable bases with NPCs

title: Blueprint Manager
description: This plugin allows server owners to create a highly customizable blueprint experience. Allowing for on demand BP access via commands, permission and timed access after wipe.
